summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3810 for the improvement of 9th Avenue and 9th Avenue North, from Westlake Avenue to Westlake Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46874, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
